articles.content: Most of us will recall getting the dreaded measles-mumps (MMR) vaccine as children. Now, it transpires the MMR vaccine may provide protection against COVID-19, according to a study that explains why … [+977 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: WHO welcomes news on AstraZeneca vaccine, awaits trial data - Reuters India
articles.description: The news on Astrazeneca's COVID-19 vaccine results is "encouraging and we look forward to seeing the data as we do with other promising results of recent weeks", the World Health Organization's chief scientist Soumya Swaminathan said on Monday.

articles.title: UNICEF planning 'mammoth operation' to deliver COVID-19 vaccines - indiablooms
